aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description1: I'm a web developer passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences. With over 2 years of experience in full-stack development, I specialize in modern technologies like Vue.js, Laravel, and Node.js.
aboutMe.description2: My approach focuses on writing clean, scalable, and maintainable code, always seeking best practices and the latest trends in web development. I love working in teams and facing new challenges that allow me to grow professionally.

footer.name: Yeray Zafra
footer.description: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating innovative and efficient web solutions.

aboutModal.title: More about me
aboutModal.storyText: I started my journey in web development over 2 years ago, motivated by the passion to create digital solutions that positively impact people's lives. My approach has always been continuous learning and the pursuit of technical excellence.
aboutModal.philosophyText: I firmly believe in clean code, good practices and collaborative work. Each project is an opportunity to learn something new and contribute to team growth.
aboutModal.hobbiesText: I enjoy exploring new technologies, reading about web development trends, and contributing to open source projects. I also like sports and spending time outdoors.
